attributes.action: OPEN UP THE FAMILY COURTS AND HAVE A JURY TO DECIDE ON THE REMOVAL OF CHILDREN FROM FAMILIES BY SOCIAL SERVICES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the family court hide a multiple of secrets and protects social services and social workers who lie in court to keep children and babies away from their family homes. ABOLISH EMOTIONAL HARM under the children's act as social services could take almost any child under 'emotional harm' No other country in europe have emotional harm down as child abuse! Help stop this country being a 'NANNY STATE' make social services and judges go public with their reasons for removing children from families and be accountable for their actions but keeping the identity of families and children secret eg A, B , C etc..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
